Texts.Eng:
^gray;Place Electrum Bars in Yellow Slot. Requires 2 for Upgrades and 4 for Creation.
      ^white;Place 5 Bars in Grey Slot to determine Weapon Level. Accepts the following:
      Copper, Iron, Tungsten, Titanium, Durasteel, Violium/Aegisalt/Ferozium, Solarium
      ^gray;Place 1 Item in Red Slot to determine Element. Accepts the following:
      Venom Sample, Scorched Core, Cryonic Extract, Static Cell, Glass (Keeps Element)
      ^white;Place desired Items in Blue Slot. Accepts the following:
      Diamond (+ Base Damage), Battery (- Energy Cost), 3 Coal (Same Stats)
      ^red;Must use Coal for creation! Modifiers (except Coal) only ever work once!
      ^gray;To upgrade an existing weapon, simply place the weapon in the Purple Slot.
      ^white;To create a new weapon, place an item in the Purple Slot. Accepts the following:
      2 Sharpened Claw (Spear), 2 Hardened Carapace (Hammer), 6 Steel Bar (Broadsword),
      1 Sharpened Claw (Dagger), 1 Hardened Carapace (Axe), 3 Steel Bar (Shortsword)
